dialogues.text: Edward watches the gangster lean back to throw...and then suddenly pulls the trigger--

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Gangster #1 lurches forward as a bullet tears through his chest. The grenade lands on the ground, rolling... It stops by a large group of GANGSTERS and..... BOOOOOM!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Edward gets hit by SHRAPNEL as Tom pulls him away...

dialogues.speaker: EDWARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Christ, I don’t believe it...!  110.

dialogues.speaker: TOM
dialogues.text: Are you hurt? Where are you hit?!

dialogues.speaker: EDWARD
dialogues.text: The same goddamn leg!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Frank peers around the corner of an alley. He sees the BA GRENADES lying beside Gangster #1’s body... Frank raises his rifle...and fires! BOOM!!! The bag explo sending five more gangsters straight to hell...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: SUPER WIDE SHOT -- Those who fled watch in horror. Half t town is on fire. And the TOMMY GUNS have started again...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: The remaining gangsters unload everything they have; read slaughter every last man, woman, and child...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Tom leans Edward against a wall as gunfire thunders aroun them. Sue suddenly appears, kneeling beside them--

dialogues.speaker: TOM
dialogues.text: It’s his leg... Sue gives Edward a shot of MORPHINE and shoves a piece of wood between his teeth...

dialogues.speaker: SUE
dialogues.text: Here, bite down on this... Edward bites down. Sue grabs a pair of pliers... SUE (CONT’D) This is going to hurt... Edward slowly nods, bracing for the worst. Sue digs into his wounded thigh, pulling out a thick piec blood-soaked SHRAPNEL. Edward screams... And then GUNFIRE erupts all around them!

dialogues.speaker: DOWN THE ALLEY
dialogues.text: A GANGSTER approaches, about to kill both Donovans and Su Fowler. Suddenly, a GUNSHOT rips his head apart...  111. Tom, Edward, and Sue slowly look up...and see Reverend Fa on the roof of his church, holding a smoking rifle.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Eli picks up a TOMMY GUN, trying to figure out how it wor Suddenly, three bullets slam into his chest! Eli falls to the ground and stares at his blood-soaked to Three DARK SHADOWS step forward and surround him--

dialogues.speaker: GANGSTER
dialogues.text: Where is she? Eli looks up defiantly, refusing to answer. Gangster #2 l his boot and pushes down on the wounds--

dialogues.speaker: GANGSTER
dialogues.text: Where. Is. She. Eli closes his eyes in pain we can only imagine. Then, suddenly-- GUNSHOTS tear the gangsters apart... .--and Frank Sullivan steps out of the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rosaleigh screams as GUNFIRE hits the steel door--

dialogues.speaker: GANGSTER
dialogues.text: Hey, you hear that? There’s a woman in there! It’s her! Rosaleigh steps back, horrified. The shooting continues.. and then the gangsters begin to break down the door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kay hides behind the register as three GANGSTERS come ins Their footsteps come closer...and closer... Kay trembles, afraid to die. Suddenly, GUNFIRE erupts and two bodies hit the ground. K hears the sound of hand-to-hand fighting... Someone screams...and a BODY hits the floor. Kay hears labored breathing. She peers around the corner. Three GANGSTERS lie dead in pools of blood; two from guns wounds, the other from a knife sticking out of his back..  112. And then Kay sees someone else-- Leonard Duschene, slumpe against the door, clutching his wounded torso... Kay grabs her husband’s crepe and rushes to Leonard's sid She puts pressure on the wound... But Leonard stops her, shaking his head. Kay hesitates, t wraps her arms him, gently cradling the dying man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue dodges GUNFIRE as she charges across the street and r down an alley. Finally, she reaches Frank and Eli... Frank looks up at her, desperate. Please, do something. Sue opens her bag and starts to treat Eli’s wounds. But t blood on the ground tells her it’s not looking good...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door hinges start to give way as GANGSTERS break down door. One of them fires through the cracks! Rosaleigh dives for the cover as gunshots rip through the office. GUNPOWDER gets ignited...and fire begins to sprea The gangsters continue to bash down the door. The crack g wider...and wider. They're almost inside... But, then, suddenly-- GUNSHOTS come from behind, killing three of the gangsters instantly. The others dive for cover and return fire...

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Tom and Edward are across the street, shooting. Tom looks and suddenly realizes the office is on fire--

dialogues.speaker: TOM
dialogues.text: God, no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue works furiously to stop Eli’s bleeding. Suddenly, he grabs her arm and gently pushes it away--

dialogues.speaker: ELI
dialogues.text: It’s okay...I’m thinking...of my little girls. Eli’s head slowly rolls back. He dies in Sue’s arms.  113. Frank stares at his father-in-law, overwhelmed. He hears distant gunfire...and sees Tom and Edward pinned down.

dialogues.speaker: SUE
dialogues.text: Frank, wait! Frank picks up the TOMMY GUN and charges down the street. Sue watches him go, then shifts her glance. Her eyes sudd narrow. She's staring at the saloon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tom takes a bullet in the arm and falls to the ground. Ed tries to help, but GUNFIRE drives him away...

dialogues.speaker: TOM
dialogues.text: Stay back! Stay back! GANGSTERS cross the street, about to finish them off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rosaleigh crawls along the floor, overwhelmed by smoke an fire. She climbs the staircase, heading for the roof...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tom and Edward both hear a hollow click as their guns run of bullets. GANGSTERS surround them...

dialogues.speaker: ON THE ROOF
dialogues.text: Rosaleigh comes outside and sees her two men surrounded; helpless, exposed, about to die...

dialogues.speaker: ROSALEIGH
dialogues.text: Nol!!! The GANGSTERS look up at Rosaleigh’s scream. And then-- Frank suddenly appears, wielding a TOMMY GUN with focus a rage. He fires at head level, cutting the gangsters down! Their bodies land beside Edward and Tom. Both Donovans lo at Frank...but they don’t have time to say thank you-- Because FLAMES suddenly burst through the roof!

dialogues.speaker: FRANK
dialogues.text: Rosaleigh, jump! Rosaleigh looks down and shakes her head. A fall from thi height will surely break her legs...  114.

dialogues.speaker: FRANK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You have to jump. Now! Rosaleigh trembles as flames explode through the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue walks around the bar and sees her husband lying in a of dried blood and shattered glass...

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Who's there...? Sue takes a deep breath and kneels beside him--

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You come to finish me off? Sue stares at George for a long, terrible moment. And the she opens her bag...and begins to treat his wounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stranger stands in the shadows, watching from a dista as Frank urges Rosaleigh to jump off the roof... AT THE SHERIFF’S OFFICE Tom and Edward struggle to get to their feet. They shout encouragement as Frank steps closer--

dialogues.speaker: FRANK
dialogues.text: Rosaleigh, jump! Now!

dialogues.speaker: ROSALEIGH
dialogues.text: I can’t!

dialogues.speaker: FRANK
dialogues.text: You can! I’1l catch you! BOOM!!! Another explosion nearly consumes her. Rosaleigh takes a deep breath...and steps off the ledge! Tom watches his wife fall gracefully for two stories and in Frank's arms. They collapse...wounded, but alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: George stares at Sue as she bandages his arm--

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE
dialogues.text: Can’t you just give me something for the pain?  115. Sue hesitates, then sticks him with a shot morphine. Geor closes his eyes with relief... Sue slips off her wedding ring and sets it beside him.

dialogues.speaker: GEORGE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (Confused) What’s that for?

dialogues.speaker: SUE
dialogues.text: (a moment, then) My pain. Sue shuts her bag and disappears out the back door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stranger raises his gun, about to pull the trigger. B then he glances at the saloon...and suddenly gets an idea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue comes over and kneels beside the Donovans... Frank crouches nearby, loading a RIFLE and two REVOLVERS. gives the handguns to Edward and Tom, then stands to leav

dialogues.speaker: TOM
dialogues.text: Where you going? Frank nods at Sue’s distant clinic--

dialogues.speaker: FRANK
dialogues.text: (Re: Girl) ‘Make sure she’s okay... Tom nods as Frank takes off down the street...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stranger steps through the shadows and kneels beside George Fowler. The wounded man looks up--

dialogues.speaker: STRANGER
dialogues.text: Where is she? George takes a deep breath, then slowly raises his bloody and points out the window...right at Sue's clinic. The stranger nods, then shoots George Fowler in the head-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue looks up at the crack of a GUNSHOT...  116. The stranger emerges from the saloon. He signals to his f remaining men, pointing towards Sue’s clinic--

dialogues.speaker: SUE
dialogues.text: Jesus, no... Tom and Edward both look up, horrified--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank enters through the back door and heads for the stai

dialogues.speaker: GANGSTER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hold it right there! Frank stops and slowly turns around. A GANGSTER stands ne the door, pointing a TOMMY GUN right at him... GANGSTER (CONT’D) In here, boys! The other four GANGSTERS come in and slowly surround Fran GANGSTER (CONT’D) (To Frank) Hands in the air... Frank glances up at the ceiling, taking notice of the han CHANDELIER -- the room's only light source. Frank raises his arms...but doesn't drop his rifle. GANGSTER (CONT’D) Hey, Bright Boy...I meant drop the gun, first! Frank suddenly pulls the trigger and the chandelier explo The room plunges to darkness as TOMMY GUNS erupt-—- The brutal gunshots light up the room with ear-splitting violence. Anguished screams of dying men quickly follow-- Anything that moves gets shot at. Bodies dance at the bullets, torn apart in the deadly crossfire... And then the guns fall with their owners, hitting the blo soaked ground as powdered smoke fills the room. The stillness lingers for a moment...and then, suddenly, there’s movement. A body shifting on the floor-- It’s Frank, still alive. Last man standing. But he’s woun .--bad enough that he’s unable to get back on his feet.  117. So he crawls, through fallen bodies and pools of blood. H over hand, foot over foot; reaching for the stairs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stranger stares at Sue’s clinic, now quiet in the abs of gunfire. He walks across the street... INT. DOCTOR’S OFFICE -- UPSTAIRS -- THAT MOMENT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank coughs blood as he crawls to Sue’s office. He hears door open downstairs. The stranger is inside the building

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stranger lights a KEROSENE LAMP and stares at the bod on the floor. He sees a blood trail leading up the stairs And then the stranger hears Frank crawling... INT. DOCTOR’S OFFICE -- CONTINUOUS Frank pushes the door open and crawls into the room as th stranger's footsteps start to thunk up the stairs... Frank looks around, desperate to find something he can us block the door. But there’s nothing. He’s stuck... Frank turns and crawls over to the girl’s bedside... He reaches up with his good arm and pulls her down to the floor. Her limp body lands softly beside him... Frank leans her against the bed as the stranger's footste reach the top of the stairs and come down the hall... Thunk...thunk...thunk... Frank takes out his revolver and opens the cylinder. He slides the last few rounds into the chamber... Then, suddenly-- Frank feels a tremor of movement beside him. He slowly turns...and sees-- The young girl is awake, staring right at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The life in Frank’s eyes is fading fast. And the stranger boots have stopped just outside the door. With his last ounce of strength, Frank puts the loaded gu into the girl’s hands...and pulls back the hammer.  118. Frank stares at the girl for a dramatic moment, then fall into her lap as the door softly opens... The girl slowly looks up, horrified-- The stranger enters the room, each footstep slow and omin He holds up his lantern and looks right at her... The girl’s breathing quickens. She clearly recognizes him The stranger smiles and takes another step forward. And t he shifts his glance to Frank Sullivan lying on the floor The girl’s eyes narrow with steely resolve. No longer afr Sensing an opportunity. She raises Frank’s revolver... .--and pulls the trigger. The lantern shatters as the bullet explodes the stranger’ skull. A mesh of brains, blood, and teeth splatter the wa The stranger drops to his knees... And then his body falls forward like a giant tree, hittin the wooden floor with a dull, sickening thud. The girl’s breathing grows calm. She slowly lowers the smoking gun...and looks down at Frank Sullivan-- His eyes appear vacant and his chest rises and falls with shallowest of breaths. We are watching him die... ..-but then the young girl’s hand dips into frame, caress his neck. She leans down and wraps her arms around him... And Frank seems to draw strength from her embrace... More HANDS suddenly appear. The surviving TOWNSPEOPLE hoi Frank into the air and carry him over to the table... Sue Fowler immediately goes to work... Tom and Edward help the girl walk across the room and sit down in a chair. She turns and looks out the window-- Bodies litter the street. The girl's eyes go wide... She glances back at Frank Sullivan, lying on the table, surrounded by friends fighting to save his life. Frank Sullivan, a man she’s never met, but who risked everything to save her. For reasons she may never know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snowflakes fall from the sky and blanket the ground with soft layer of white as far as the eye can see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank Sullivan lies in bed, his body tattooed with bruise and lacerations. Suddenly, he opens his eyes... ...and sees someone across the room-- Sue Fowler gets out of her chair and slowly approaches. S kneels at his bedside, smiling gently--

dialogues.speaker: SUE
dialogues.text: How are you feeling? Frank glances at his body, then nods. Not bad...consideri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank and Sue come out into the hallway and limp towards stairs. They start to tackle them one a time... Halfway down, Frank Sullivan suddenly stops... His house is filled with PEOPLE-- The Donovans. Kay Ander A few familiar faces from the saloon... Frank and Sue reach the main floor and everyone surrounds them. Frank smiles as he receives pats on the back... And then he senses another presence in the room-- The young girl. She's standing near the window, wearing a brand new dress looking vibrant, beautiful...and full of life. Frank's breathing quickens as she stands before him, look deep into the eyes of the man who saved her life... As tears begin to fall down her cheeks, the girl throws h arms around Frank and holds on for dear life... Everyone watches this tender scene unfold, touched by Fra journey. Satisfied by his reward. Frank Sullivan was dealt the greatest of tragedies. But i this moment...he has an awful lot to live for.
